effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.2 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 646,847.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 3.5 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,355, further increased by 352 while you remain within its light.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Antumbra, Shadow of the Cosmos

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 50%.
